1.content:
Somewhere off in a dark distant world, removed from the flow of time immemorial and adrift from space, untouched by any human or soul we know of. Dark cliffs and black sand littered the world endlessly, and the gentle blanket of grey clouds overshadowed the landscape. No sun ever shown, the wind was brief and world silent. However, it was far from unlively. If one were to pay attention closely in this world, they'd see it's inhabitants are very much about, skittering the edges of it's voiden chasm.

They arrive in a flash and leave the dusk of their world just as quickly, like wisp of light coursing through the air. These creatures need not stay in their world for long, although they assuredly will make travel through it. The very moment they enter, another entryway provides their exit and they're warping through portals and passageways to unlimited universes. Once they come across a world, they do what they're naturally inclined to do, mess around with their inhabitants and manipulate them freely. With their powerful abilities, it's not hard, and nobody is off limits or could ever stop them from their play. Save for their queen, Malaise, should she choose victims of her own, are hers to toy with. The rest of the species have no restrictions, nor do they on their own appearances or victims.

One briefly zapped through it's banal planet for an instant, and than in less than a second was gone again toward's it's next world. It would find new souls to tempt and play with, all for it's own amusement. Perhaps even a game of Musical Swap was in order. Either way, it'd have an interesting time. The Imp worked out it's options while it arrived at it's next destination.
1.title: The World of Imps

11.content:
The imp slithered around through new regions of the vast interdimesional plane for which it dwelled. Zipping through portal after portal, tunnel through tunnel, it slithered around like a sly fox, looking for it's next target. In the region it was currently at, countless characters toiled with their daily adventures, with their big cartoony eyes and colorful hair. The imp thought to itself this would be a good place to test it's abilities and mess with the lives of it's inhabitants. A game of Musical Swap would be especially pleasing to it's ears, should it play the notes.

Wandering around impishly, it finally popped through a entry portal and landed in...
11.title: Anime

111.content:
Finally arriving into a new universe of it's choosing, it'd come into the world of which we'd subscribe the events of 'Naruto.' Ninjas and old fashioned citizens jumped through trees and atop of buildings. Weapon shops and Ramen stands. Academy graduates were exiting their schools to leave off, hoping to be shinobi, just as Chuunin and Jonin, elite ninja set out to make their way into the world. The village it had entered was positively bustling, perfect for manipulation and tricky imp fun.

Seeing this world as acceptable, a very sly imp started creaking around the shadows of the world and looking for it's first playmate,
111.title: Naruto

1111.content:
The devious and strange creature phased and hopped through building after another, inspecting person alike. It saw them to be short and tall, male and female, but nudged and fickled with what sort of host should be the victor of it's selection, the one to play it's games and have the honor of presenting it a fine show. Looking into their minds was another criteria, but often it wouldn't wield very interesting results. Most people in this Village had known peace for too long, had very disciplined and single track minds, and very little result varying from predictability should it choose to intervene. The nameless imp was starting to think maybe this world wasn't fit for meddling afterall.

That was, until it came across her. A rookie kunoichi, with bright pink hair, Aqua green-blue eyes, a dressy red sleeveless vest attached to her split skirt and spandex pants. Reading through the morsels of her thought and this world's fabric, it now knew her name was "Sakura Haruno."

The imp smiled. It's form would come to light soon, only for her however. But there was no way it would let such a fine specimen go. It whizzed behind her, with only a slight tingling on her part.

"Huh? Did anybody feel that?" The pink haired girl said.

"I didn't see anything. " Shikimaru replied, rubbing his head boredly.

"And we're standing over here behind you, so don't blame us." Choji added, munching on a candybar.

Sakura shrugged and dismissed it. They continued walking, having to shop for more weapons. Sakura tried to forget the brief feeling she felt, as if something passed through her. She noticed not when her body underwent a weird tingling, like it was vibrating or harmonizing from within. The Imp only cooed, taking delight in the process. In it's own bizarre language, it rang a tune to the sound that reverberates through a sound soul. And one that would effect this girl down to her core completely.

Sakura stopped for a moment. "Are, are you guys sure? I could have sworn I just heard something just now."

The two ninjas accompanying her looked at each other. Choji fessed up, "Okay fine, I had a little too much rice dumpling last night. Makes me queer and noxious, okay?"

She shook her head. "No, no not that it's almost as if.. as if I can hear, singing?"

Suddenly, Sakura's eyes went glassy and her head went slightly blank. She started walking off, as if in a trance.

Elsewhere, a similar thing was happening to...
1111.title: Sakura is chosen

11113.content:
Sakura walked thoughtlessly across the village, merely following her next destination without goal or motive. Her friends Shikamaru and Choji were occupying her, but while they were chasing her, suddenly a strange dullness in their minds kicked in, and it was as if they suddenly were unable to care or even realize what was taking place. They simply carried on casually without her.

The pink haired girl however, has made her way all the way through the shopping and living districts, and arrived back in her apartment, after crossing several dozen streets and several flights of stairs. She stood in her room, strangely transfixed. The imp that had cursed this upon her before zipped in, and slowly manifested. Looking like a shiny red women with a rubbery body, bu with duck feet , a black goat's head and talon-like fingernails, it scratched the surface of the room and with a single spark, had drastically changed it.

Sakura proceeded to walk into her closet and look through her wardrobe. She took off her signature red dress, sandals, and everything else. Once she had stripped nude, she peered into her closet. Everything had changed, altered as if magically and she hadn't a word to say about it. Sakura reached into the newly formed wardrobe and picked out...
11113.title: Rukia from Bleach/Another character

111132.content:
Will she find an Akatsuki cloak, becoming a member of Akatsuki and replacing Konan or joining as a new female member?

Visual Aide:
http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg160...
111132.title: An Akatsuki Cloak

1112.content:
Sasuke was brooding out somewhere outside the Leaf Village, plotting his next scheme. He'd escaped the grasp of Orochimaru, successfully killed his brother, went through a whole hoobaloo from Naruto about defeating Akatsuki and Madara and all that jazz. But now he stood in his shack, bored. His three accomplices, Suigetsu, Jūgo, and Karen lounged about with him. They had started up a minor business since the events of their world had calmed down a year ago, but now they simply expired their time bored and lazy in their shack waiting for customers to catch wind of their services and offer up opportunities.

Suddenly the door swung open, and the four of them eye's opened wide up like a parachute, only f or their hopes to falter back down and crash when no one arrived.

"This sucks. There has to be a better way to make money than this, I'm never going to recollect all the 7 swords at this rate." Suigetsu moaned.

"Patience, we have to have diligence and patience." Jugo said sternly, meditating and keeping his irate in check.

Sasuke 'Tsh'ked and laid back. Even after everything that has happened to him, he'd never imagine the world would be as dull as it was now. Suddenly, that plain lifeless waiting was about to end. Like death reaching out to him, he saw an instant vision of a terrible reaper in front of him. It was only for a mere second, but it was mere than enough to send him flying back.

"Sasuke!" Karen yelled, running to help him up. Sasuke rubbed his eyes and breathed heavily, just what was that? A skull monster, a Shinigami, some jutsu or genjutsu, something else? For a second that, thing had flashed to him swiping it's scythe at his neck, leading him to flinch and get blown back on impact. He was still alive and not decapitated obviously, but still.

Feeling his neck, groping it for a gash or wound, nothing was present. In fact, he realized he couldn't quite feel, well just about anything. His neck and hands were numb, and his whole body soon followed. "What is.." His voice trailed out as the rest of him seemed to phase over, like taken possession. As his eyes turned glassy, he got up pushed his companions aide, and simply walked out the door without a thought.

The imp smiled at it's deeds nearby. The game of Musical swap would begin, and it would affect him towards replacing...
1112.title: Sasuke

1113.content:
The imp floated over the village, among the wires and tall rooftops, searching for a moral to mess with. It had a particular taste for those that were either feisty and had a bit of fight in them, or in those that are mousy and would naturally be the perfect candidates. Spying through the crowd, it saw two such specimens perfect for it's specifications, a tall blond girl and her companion, a darker haired one trailing behind. They were holding shopping bags and skittering around the crowd, which made them easy to sight. The one in the front blabbered about while the one behind nodded and listened diligently. Maybe these two would be good choices, or at least the easiest in sight, owing to it's patience which Imps weren't particularly known for.

As the imp swarmed around examining it's pray, it finally chose...
1113.title: Hinata/Someone else

11131.content:
"Okay Hinata, I have to go run some errands. Meet me back here in a few hours and we'll talk about that special something you were so nervous to talk with me." Ino told her friend.

"Umm.. Okay Ino. I'll see you later." The young miss Hyūga affirmed back and slowly began making her way solo.

As the two separated, it was unknown to them but a sick twisted smile formed elswhere. A creature nearby snickered to itself a nasty grin, and began to warp time and space around the area, blending into locals, and soon giving itself a new occupation.

Hinata oblivious to this, wandered around. She hadn't much left to do here, but her hunger and fatigue grew, so she felt the need to stop somewhere. The problem being where exactly, she wasn't too familiar with the shops or people around that district. She started to scout through buildings and vendors, unknowingly trailed by a shadowy figure.

Despite her vision giving her the capability to see in 360 degrees, it couldn't see people's intentions or through the disguises of otherworldly creatures. Shyly making her way through the streets, she could hardly give an 'eep' when a cold icy feeling sent shivers across her shoulders.
11131.title: Haunting Hinata

111311.content:
The imp looked onwards at Hinata. Soon she'd have a drastic change forced onto her, the Imp thought. It was giddy at the thought of manipulating and messing with another innocent life, but in what unforeseen way? It could swap her with somebody, or perhaps make her another Imp like itself, watching her slowly lose her sanity as she gives in to her abuse and lust for power.

Than it had it. This girl wasn't worthy to be an Imp like itself. Imps were naturally vain and narcissistic creatures, and it didn't have the know or heart to be an Imp, and changing that would be just like cheating.

The Imp snickered, it had a brilliant idea. Reaching it's arm through the nexus of infinite reality and fiction, it received a vintage image of some sort of puppet, a pink swine creature. Yes, this would do nicely, she'd never see it coming.

With one last snicker, the Imp rubbed it's hands, be they real or figurative, and dove into it's victim.

Hinata gave an 'Eeep', and a large puff of smoke went out, followed by a flash of light and a rumble. Everyone ran away panicked. When all was said and done, Hinata had become...
111311.title: A new, Porcine Piggy Hinata

choices: To make you see things differently
111312.content:
Aaaa!" Hinata shrieked, jumping back suddenly. A cold hand had place itself on her shoulder and in her shock she almost threw herself back. Wobbly and dismayed, she however kept herself from falling and gasped desperately to catch her breath.

"Oh, I'm so sorry. I shouldn't have approached you like that." The nice 'Lady' said.

Hinata sighed and reluctantly approached her stalker. "Oh, t..that's very much alight."

She shook her the ladies gloved hand as it was presented out before her. "Bella. Bella Dominique Beatrix." The lady introduced herself strangely, shaking and smiling her new acquaintance down like one might a child. She had very pale skin and oval glasses with slicked back blond hair, a frosty lemon color crisp and a single bang flowed down the side of her head. She was dressed in a clean white cloaked suit, not unlike a Doctor of Scientist, minus the hood, and stood at 6 feet shaking the young girl down. White gloves decorated her wrist, as tight and rubbery as the boots and stockings coating her thighs down. A pencil miniskirt covered her bottom held together by a belt at her waist, and her wardrobe as a whole was white as snow, contrasting with her sharp red eyes underneath her misty shades.

"It's, uh, nice to meet you. I'm sorry if I was startled."

"Oh that's very much alright, that's my fault mainly. I should have been more courteous than to merely creeped up behind, anyway. I'd like to talk about a proposition for you."

"A, A proposition? For me?" Hinata gasped, widening her eyes at the strangers face.

"Yes, that's right." The lady, Bella as she called herself confirmed.
111312.title: "Hello there miss."

1113121.content:
"Me? Special, s-surely you couldn't." Hinata blushed and faintly turned her head away as she heard these words. As a Hyūga and heiress of her clan, she as selected to be it's main branches carrier and leader in the future, but she had digressed from this purpose and always thought it nerve wracking to be in such a position. For this lady to come here and tell her she'd be able to make her any more "special", was a dilemma in herself.

"Oh, but I could! Believe me when I say, my abilities are great. And soon yours will too, little Hinata." The women had a gleam in her glasses that shone against the sun, one almost hiding a mysterious intent.

Hinata didn't remember giving this lady her name, who was she? She swallowed her gut and tried to hold steady. "Look, I really don't want to be made anything. I'd much rather just stay myself, so-"

"Oh but I must insist! I see what you've got going on inside you, and I can arrange for you to be so much more." Bella interrupted.

Hinata stared at her, prompting Bella to grin wider, as if seeing the kind of look she wanted at least. She knew Hinata was hooked. Bait, line and sinker.

"Okay," The shy ninja girl swallowed and braced herself. "Say you can make me special or whatever it is your saying. What would change?"

Bella tapped Hinata's shoulder, and a slight light pored out.
1113121.title: "To make you something Special"

choices: Bella explains what she's doing to Hinata
11131211.content:
"Well for one thing-" Bella mused as she tapped the reluctant Hinata's shoulder, who squirmed slightly at first but slowly cooed as Bella's tap turned into a pat, than a gentle caress, massaging it as light emitted from Bella's palms and slowly surged through Hinata.

She shuddered and moaned. "M-more confident? How do you mean, how will that-"

"Ssssh." The pale stranger hushed her and let her process finish. "Trust me, you're going to love it."

A few minutes passed, and when Bella was done Hinata's outfit was coated a slick shiny coat, almost like some kind of tight vinyl or rubber. Hinata's head was still reeling, but she could tell something was changed. She looked down and gasped at her new slicked up outfit, a fetishized version of her own wardrobe.

"What did you do! I didn't ask you to change anything!"
She looked at Bella angrily, but suddenly her rage subsided as if instantly, recognizing new emotions and values she didn't before. Why was she able to address this lady now. There was no stammer in her voice, and she didn't even feel nervous or scared. Upset surely at what this lady had done without her permission, but there was an air of confidence overtaking her, she actually felt like she could confront her. The strange fears that had frightened her so, were gone.

"What, are you exactly?" Hinata begged the question.

Bella Beatrix smile, and put a single finger on Hinata's lips, turning them a muted blue color, shined like her outfit.

"An Imp. But to you my lovely little Hinata, just an observer. And you are going to be my experiment."
11131211.title: She'll be more confident

12.content:
The imp slithered around through new regions of the vast interdimesional plane for which it dwelled. Zipping through portal after portal, tunnel through tunnel, it slithered around like a sly fox, looking for it's next target. In the region it was currently at, countless characters toiled with their daily adventures, The imp thought to itself this would be a good place to test it's abilities and mess with the lives of it's inhabitants. A game of Musical Swap would be especially pleasing to it's ears, should it play the notes.

Wandering around impishly, it finally popped through a entry portal and landed in...
12.title: Videogames

13.content:
The worlds of comics and cartoons it is.

Now, what world will are friend enter first?
13.title: Comics/Cartoons

choices: The world of Buffy The Vampire Slayer.
14.content: What TV or movie world does this particular imp end up visiting?
14.title: Television/Movies

info.brief_description: A race of mischievous magical creatures switch and mess with Fictional characters lives
info.description:
The Imp's are on the loose!


Inspired by Fiction Branches Wishing Rock Saga and their concept of Musical closets

Imp's are a very strange species indeed. They're more like pixies or fairies of ancient lore, but they are very mischievous. With their vast amounts of magic and desire to change things, they tend to mess with people in unique ways. Being powerful creatures, they're able to visit and perceive any universe they choose, and mess around how they please.

A favorite game they like to play is called "Musical Swap", whereas after singing a tune to certain characters, makes them change completely. This can be life changes imitating another character, becoming much like them in their own way, or simple fun changes like personality, job, mind or role switches. It commonly follows a formula where two characters switch depositions, but can vary as far out as the Imp
Reader and writer's
wishes.

Imp's often have unique types and personalities of their own. Although they're usually small, with wings or horns, they can shapeshift at will, and take on as many forms even naturally as one could imagine. They can be angelic, like looking fairies or nymphs, or perhaps more devil-like. They can be puddles or insects, or trolls or Oni, inanimate objects, other characters, hippos flowers or doorknobs, or whatever. But they do tend to be really slinky and shiny, often sensual. Even after they've sung their initial song, they tend to want to mess around and interfere, often interacting with their victim as much as possible to maximize the fun.

Among the most special of the Imp's is the Queen Imp, Malaise. While she is vain and pretty, almighty and yet obscenely bawdy, she's a very charismatic and devilish creature. Unlike other Imps which are carefree, as Queen of the Imp's she's devious, always scheming, clever and very powerful. When she makes a change it will always serve a sort of intended purpose, which she may or may not reveal depending on her mood
The Writers decision
.

Given this, it's this Interactive's topic to log the exploits and tales of these strange creatures. How they swap up characters, how they change and manipulate people's lives, and what sort of mischief they induce. Sometimes it's random, other's they may want more than fun and are aiming for a different result. They might try to convert other's into slinky, perverted imps like themselves, or they'll give them certain traits just because they find it amusing.

How will the characters react to these Imps? That's a question that's answered perpetually in flux in this story, so come on in!


Some Guidelines:
1.Basically the Imps can perform magic, leading to TF, TG, MC, AP, AR, and any sort of change, physical or mental, personal or of reality, on a fictional character
2.One of the things they like to do most is Swap characters, but in different restricted and special ways as you'll see
3.So long as it's entertaining and follow's the Imp premise I'm fine with it. No Vore/Gore or obscene death though, they're not sadist or downright evil
4.Respect other people's choices, don't flame and try to contribute positively
5.Content rating is 18+, and there may be some adult themes but try to use proper judgement. Sex/Violence is at the writer's digression, and the Imp's are creative enough that they don't care for forced Sex 24/7
Reader's will get annoyed if you jump to a random pornographic sex scene every single chapter or random option

6.Use acceptable spelling and grammar please
7.The Imps, with unlimited power can take any form they, well you choose and enter anywhere. Any Fiction is allowed or fetishy topic, just be creative. Go wild with it!
8.And lastly, just be mindful of content. This is an experimental Interactive, it's not supposed to be a coherent work but just fun place to test ideas. I don't mind what series you use or suggest, but do try to contribute. I'm not going to delete any chapters or options just because they don't go anywhere or are just option
"How about 'X'?
after option
More options
, even if it does get to that point just try your best and have fun with it

So let's see what those Imps are up to next!
